message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Considering its value and quality, I believe it's worth $95 for you. Let me know if this works for you!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to pay that price for the quality and value you're offering.
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. Considering the value of the product, I think we can agree on a price of $90. I hope this works for you!
I'm getting closer, but I was thinking more like $82.50. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. How about we aim for a price of $87.5? This still reflects the product's value while being more accommodating to your financial situation.
I'm getting close, but I think we can do better. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product. That's my final offer.
